issue.title: [C++] Organize tests in scalar_compare_test.cc
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-15342](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-15342). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Make the tests more concise and ensure they have good coverage and little duplication.
